document_project.name: document_project
document_project.docstring:
Document a project and generate documentation files.

Optionally start watching the project for file changes.

list_documented_projects.name: list_documented_projects
list_documented_projects.docstring: List all projects that have been documented.

get_project_documentation.name: get_project_documentation
get_project_documentation.docstring: Get the documentation for a specific project.

stop_watching_project.name: stop_watching_project
stop_watching_project.docstring: Stop watching a project for changes.

view_documentation.name: view_documentation
view_documentation.docstring: View the HTML documentation for a project.

refresh_documentation.name: refresh_documentation
refresh_documentation.docstring: Manually refresh the documentation for a project.

documentation_dashboard.name: documentation_dashboard
documentation_dashboard.docstring: Return the HTML dashboard for managing documentation.

get_service_status.name: get_service_status
get_service_status.docstring: Get the status of the documentation service.

ProjectConfig.name: ProjectConfig
ProjectConfig.docstring: Configuration for a project to be documented.

validate_project_path.name: validate_project_path
validate_project_path.docstring: Validate that the project path exists and is a directory.

FunctionInfo.name: FunctionInfo
FunctionInfo.docstring: Information about a function in a Python module.

MethodInfo.name: MethodInfo
MethodInfo.docstring: Information about a method in a class.

ClassInfo.name: ClassInfo
ClassInfo.docstring: Information about a class in a Python module.

ImportInfo.name: ImportInfo
ImportInfo.docstring: Information about imports in a Python module.

FileDocumentation.name: FileDocumentation
FileDocumentation.docstring: Documentation for a single Python file.

validate_file_path.name: validate_file_path
validate_file_path.docstring: Validate that the file path exists.

DirectoryStructure.name: DirectoryStructure
DirectoryStructure.docstring: Recursive model representing a directory structure.

validate_project_path.name: validate_project_path
validate_project_path.docstring: Validate that the project path exists and is a directory.

DocumentationResult.name: DocumentationResult
DocumentationResult.docstring: Result of a documentation generation process.

DirectoryScanner.name: DirectoryScanner
DirectoryScanner.docstring: Scanner for project directories that builds structure and tracks files.

__init__.name: __init__
__init__.docstring:
Initialize the directory scanner.

Args:
    project_path: Path to the project directory
    excluded_dirs: List of directory names to exclude
    excluded_files: List of file patterns to exclude

is_python_file.name: is_python_file
is_python_file.docstring: Check if a file is a Python file.

should_exclude.name: should_exclude
should_exclude.docstring: Check if a path should be excluded from documentation.

get_all_python_files.name: get_all_python_files
get_all_python_files.docstring: Get all Python files in the project directory.

get_project_structure.name: get_project_structure
get_project_structure.docstring:
Generate a recursive structure representing the project directory.

Returns:
    DirectoryStructure object with the project hierarchy

DocGenerator.name: DocGenerator
DocGenerator.docstring:
Main documentation generator service.
Coordinates parsing files and generating documentation.

__init__.name: __init__
__init__.docstring:
Initialize the documentation generator.

Args:
    config: Project configuration

save_documentation.name: save_documentation
save_documentation.docstring:
Save the documentation data to a JSON file.

Args:
    output_path: Directory where the JSON file should be saved.

document_project.name: document_project
document_project.docstring: Generate documentation for the entire project.

start_watching.name: start_watching
start_watching.docstring: Start watching the project directory for changes.

generate_output.name: generate_output
generate_output.docstring:
Generate documentation output files.

Args:
    results: Optional list of DocumentationResult objects. If not provided,
            will use stored documentation.

create_watcher.name: create_watcher
create_watcher.docstring:
Create and return a watcher for the project.
This method is for compatibility with the API.

Returns:
    self: Returns the DocGenerator instance itself

document_file.name: document_file
document_file.docstring:
Generate documentation for a single file.

Args:
    file_path: Path to the file to document
    
Returns:
    DocumentationResult object if successful, None otherwise

FileParser.name: FileParser
FileParser.docstring: Parser for Python files to extract documentation.

__init__.name: __init__
__init__.docstring:
Initialize the file parser.

Args:
    include_private: Whether to include private members (starting with _)
    include_source_code: Whether to include source code in the documentation

parse_file.name: parse_file
parse_file.docstring:
Parse a Python file and extract documentation.

Args:
    file_path: Path to the Python file to parse
    
Returns:
    FileDocumentation object containing the parsed information

FileSystemWatcher.name: FileSystemWatcher
FileSystemWatcher.docstring: Watches a directory for changes to Python files.

__init__.name: __init__
__init__.docstring:
Initialize the file system watcher.

Args:
    directory: Directory to watch
    callback: Function to call when a file changes
    interval: Polling interval in seconds
    file_filter: Optional function to filter files to watch

start.name: start
start.docstring: Start watching for file changes in a background thread.
